headline: PDF Solutions (PDFS) Is Down 6.4% After Record Revenue and Major AI-Driven Contract Wins – What's Changed
summary: In November 2025, PDF Solutions reported record third-quarter revenue of US$57.12 million, representing a year-over-year increase, alongside major multi-million dollar contracts across its semiconductor analytics and equipment connectivity platforms. The company also reaffirmed its annual revenue growth outlook and highlighted an expansion of AI-driven capabilities, including integrating Intel's Tiber AI Studio into its Exensio platform. We'll examine how the combination of record revenues...
